channel.title: CVE Feed for shoppingflux -- module-prestashop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for shoppingflux -- module-prestashop

item.title: CVE-2023-28839|2023-04-18T20:44:55.733Z -- shoppingflux -- module-prestashop
item.description: Shoppingfeed PrestaShop is an add-on to the PrestaShop ecommerce platform to synchronize data. The module Shoppingfeed for PrestaShop is vulnerable to SQL injection between version 1.4.0 and 1.8.2 due to a lack of input sanitization. This issue has been addressed in version 1.8.3. Users are advised to upgrade. There are no known workarounds for this issue.
